QuestData.Title: The Den of Skog
QuestData.Description: So this gronn infestation ain't gonna solve itself. You're gonna have to show them who's boss, Horde style!$b$bWith this many gronnlings around there is bound to be a full grown, big mama of a gronn. Find him... it... her... or whatever, and take it out, and the rest of those gronnlings might lose interest in our little operation here.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Mother and/or father of the local gronnlings.
QuestData.RewardText: Little known fact, old gronn grottos make for great farming soil.
